mapper.select: select count(serial) totList from review where subject like '%${_parameter}%' or doc like '%${_parameter}%'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rno, m.* FROM ( SELECT serial, pserial, lpad(' ', (LEVEL-1)*4, ' └ ') || subject subject, mid, hit, to_char(mdate, 'rrrr-mm-dd') mdate, (SELECT count(serial) FROM reviewAtt WHERE b.serial = pserial) attCnt FROM review b WHERE subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' OR doc LIKE '%${findStr}%' START WITH pserial IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR serial = pserial ORDER siblings BY serial DESC)m )WHERE rno BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into review(serial, subject, doc, mid, pwd, mdate, hit, gubun) values(#{serial}, #{subject}, #{doc}, #{mid}, #{pwd}, sysdate, 0, #{gubun})
insert into reviewAtt(serial, pserial, oriAtt, sysAtt) value(seq_reviewAtt.nextval, #{pSerial}, #{oriAtt}, #{sysAtt})
mapper.update: update review set hit=hit+1 where serial = #{_parameter}
